alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 4:47PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of east central Essex, west central Orange, Addison, southern Chittenden, northwestern Windsor and southwestern Washington Counties through 530 PM EST... At 447 PM EST, heavy snow was reported near New Haven, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Vergennes, Weybridge, Monkton Ridge, Lincoln, Monkton, Monkton Boro, New Haven, Granville, Hancock, Ripton, Starksboro, Ferrisburg, Waltham, Bristol, Waitsfield, Fayston, Panton, Northfield Village and Kingsland Bay State Park.
